Headline: #92 Foster |Temporary Reroute at Foster/Clark
ShortDescription: 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Broadway, Lawrence, Ashland and Foster due to, street blockage near Foster/Clark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Broadway, Lawrence, Ashland and Foster due to, street blockage near Foster/Clark.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at UIC-Halsted
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC-Halsted due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC-Halsted due to a door problem.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
